reviews.review: Если тебе чужды игры без ввода в консоли читов, удаляй, ибо игра только для сильных духом и телом

CS:GO, un incontournable du FPS sur PC, la crème de la crème :D !

Unless Valve doesnt finally fix the anticheat this game is basically garbage. I love Counter Strike, but you face the most obvious wallhacks and aimlocks in every second game. Rank DMG-LE. It is ridiculous. If VAC does not get improved, Valorant will be #1 very soon. And pleeaase Valve, put an extra server for middle europe. I do not understand why we should play with Russians and Turks, of which you do not understand a single word and the Toxicity is higher than in this one System of a Down song. Sorry for the rant but it is the truth.

Its got an amazing competitive aspect to it and it's extremly fun to hope into casuals and mess around. I'd suggest it to anyone who enjoys to rank up on competitive and have a quality time to mess around with your friends.
Very good game. I prefer wait for 21lvl, than buying prime.
very good game, giv me skins

Trust factor olayından sonra tamamen garipleşen,hilelerin banlanmadığı, sunucularında sorunlar olan, hala Valvenin sağdığı oyun. Oyuncularının silver eloda şerefsiz hareketler yapması ve kominikasyonun bok gibi olmasından dolayı oynamaktan zevk alamadığım ancak 900e yakın saatim olduğu için kıyamadığım bu oyunu lütfen 2017 haline döndürün :(.(HAYATIMI SİKTİ 900 SAAT TEST ÇÖZSEM ODTÜYE ALIRLARDI PÜ AMINA KOYİM)
